subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
* [[子女]] ([[자녀]], ja-nyeo) : [[children]]
* [[女子]] ([[여자]], yeo-ja) : [[woman]], [[female]]
* [[男子]] ([[남자]], nam-ja) : [[man]], [[male]]
* [[子孫]] ([[자손]], ja-son) : [[descendant]]
* [[孫子]] ([[손자]], son-ja) : [[grandson]], [[grandchild]]
* [[子正]] ([[자정]], ja-jeong) : [[midnight]]
* [[遺傳子]] ([[유전자]], yu-jeon-ja) : [[gene]]
